Name: Schmutznik
About the game: Use your robot Schmutznik to clean up slime in the underground realm. Reach higher platforms with your telescopic neck. Each of the 35 caves has a new mechanic or idea to experience. 99% of the art is made from colored clay.
Meta Title: Schmutznik: Oct 14, 2021, Avram Dumitrescu and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Schmutznik? Check out the release date (Oct 14, 2021), developer insights from Avram Dumitrescu, and a complete game summary.
